column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Craig - Thanks for your review. Please know if you are dissatisfied with your ramen for any reason whatsoever
column2: we will gladly remake your bowl or offer you something that might be more suited to your liking. Regardless
column3: I appreciate that you have visited us on more than one occasion
column4: and I hope you can find something on our menu that you enjoy thoroughly. Thank you again.
